name: Space Frontline
description:
Space Frontline is a mobile arcade/strategy game. During real-time match you will have to capture all planets systems on map. Build different structures on planet such as shipyards and barracks to produce ships and turrets to defend system from enemy invaders. Choose fleet and attack connected systems until all galaxy is under control!

Genre: Strategy 
Platform: Android

Currently is in development, you can see devlog links below.

Controls

Click on planet - Opens planet control menu

Left top game speed button:

Click - Speed up/Speed down

Long click - Pause

Buildings

 Shipyard; Make you able to produce attack ships on planet

 Barracks; Allow you to make transport ships

 Defence Turrets; Add planet ground defence points

 Trading Center; Give some credits

 Mining Station; Produce more minerals on planet

  Warp Gates; Increase fleets travel away speed

Gameplay
